item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Good luck with the journey and the Lotusphere stuff, Matthew. We're off to see Miss 'murder on the dancefloor' Sophie Ellis-Bextor tonight, so probably won't telephone in to wish you well. Enjoy the SIX (so unfair!) weeks of touring the world!! I will, as ever, check your website each day! Si</p>
item.content:encoded: Good luck with the journey and the Lotusphere stuff, Matthew. We’re off to see Miss ‘murder on the dancefloor’ Sophie Ellis-Bextor tonight, so probably won’t telephone in to wish you well. Enjoy the SIX (so unfair!) weeks of touring the world!! I will, as ever, check your website each day! Si

item.title: By: Andy Harris
item.dc:creator: Andy Harris
item.description: <p>Should we all be humming the tune to "The Great Escape" about now? (or is it the Death March?)</p>
item.content:encoded: Should we all be humming the tune to “The Great Escape” about now? (or is it the Death March?)

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Matthew, Have a really fantastic trip. We will be following your travels with interest. Take good care Fi</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, Have a really fantastic trip. We will be following your travels with interest. Take good care Fi
